headline: Fitzpatrick leads Delaware River Watershed Caucus in calling for conservation funding
author: Bucks Local News
sentences:

Representatives Brian Fitzpatrick (PA-01) and Antonio Delgado (NY-19), founders and co-chairs of the Congressional Delaware River Watershed Caucus, is leading a group of 16 caucus members in requesting that the Fiscal Year 2022 funding bill include $12.5 million for the Delaware River Basin Restoration Program (DRBRP).
The funding level represents a 25 percent increase from the previous year.
